fields.summary: create alert dialog popup not showing multiple times

comments.body: Any Update on this inquiry. Please suggest something so that we can proceed further

This is by design (Apple). 

Recommendation: monitor the click event on the first dialog, and then open the second one after the first one has closed. An array could be created with the dialogs, and then just splice the first one from the array and show it

Hope this helps.
